data.message: To all those posting negative comments-may you one day look back at this with shame.  Most had ancestors that did not agree with interracial marriage and integration of the races.  Today we look back at that time as ridiculous and ill-informed.  Future generations will look at comments like these the same way.  Plus, I didn't read anything in this post about supporting gay marriage-just that the majority of folks are in some way connected to a gay person.  And that is just a statistical fact, not a political opinion.
